content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1665669074732{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 130px !important;background-image: url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/https://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/dsl-bg-3-01.webp?id=26653) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”bg-position”][vc_column width=”1/2″ disable_custom_paddings_tablet=”true” disable_custom_paddings_mobile=”true” offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1666023279232{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-right: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;margin-left: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/https://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/1-01-1-min.jpg?id=27197) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-radius: 10px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

WHAT IS DIGITAL SOFTWARE LABS?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Digital software lab is a platform where we do wonders by offering services with our craze over internet. We create innovative strategies for the customer’s needs and wants. Digital Software Labs believe in customer’s success from our channel, because we know what are the main aspects of business acceleration, which help our clients to get on the right track and flourish globally, that’s why customer satisfaction is our main focus.[/vc_column_text]

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
  • Digital Marketing
  • E commerce
  • Branding and Communication
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]
  • UI/UX Design
  • Web Design and Development
  • Inbound and Outbound Call Center
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1460191277357{margin-top: -100px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;background-color: #f0f3f2 !important;}” el_class=”no-padding-quick”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Why choose Digital Software Labs?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]


[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1602869170354{margin-right: 35px !important;margin-left: 35px !important;}”]

Meaningful Interaction

Every interaction we make is an opportunity to create a strong relationship because every interaction is really important for us because we see it as a chance to learn something new.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1602869437130{margin-right: 35px !important;margin-left: 35px !important;}”]

Personal Development

This is our core value of the company. We believe the best investment is to invest in ourselves and perform as best we can. We consider productivity is everything a business needs and that is what differentiates us from others.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1602869735272{margin-right: 35px !important;margin-left: 35px !important;}”]

Pursue Excellence

Our thinking is based on pursuing excellence rather than expanding ourselves to a bigger extent. We consider excellence as our talent rather than our success as it is our habit to work that way.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”top” content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1609239908519{padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/DSL-Services-1024×709-3.webp?id=26534) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”sub-none-mobile”][vc_column]
[vc_empty_space height=”150px”][vc_column_text]

more services

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

We offer full-time services to our clients which includes, business statistics and variety of digital tactics for promotion, success rate, and revenue. We wish to help every business to reach their objective and targets. Digital Software Labs is providing proper plan and statistics for market growth.

[/vc_column_text]

view all
[vc_empty_space height=”150px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_custom_paddings_tablet=”true” disable_custom_paddings_mobile=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1604506545776{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”portfolio-padding”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

our portfolio

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1603212688974{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}”]

Clients hold a very important place in our business. Our priority is to satisfy the client by providing the services they need. We believe happy customers are the reason for our growth so we do not take any risk on that.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_media_grid style=”load-more” items_per_page=”9″ gap=”0″ grid_id=”vc_gid:1670856303321-4ecfc755c5164e0e89712537c96feb14-3″ include=”26361,26366,26391,26372,26380,26357″]
View Portfolio
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1666367087037{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(https://mlygf3tggwd2.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:avif/https://digitalsoftwarelabs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Contact-Form.webp?id=26579) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_column_text]

CONNECT WITH US

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Please email us your questions regarding our services

[/vc_column_text]

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1603290475647{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1603290876000{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”]
    [vc_column_text]

    Client’s Reviews

    [/vc_column_text]

    Mark Morris

    Digital Software Labs had a flawlessly executed strategy, helping us transform our crucial business operations to meet modern challenges.

    Elliot Giannini

    We found Digital Software Labs as an extremely professional and reliable company to work with. DSL has, without any doubt, added value to our brand and helped us reach our potential goals.

    Patricia Watson

    Digital Software Labs ability to deliver projects in such crucial times is incredible. We are impressed with their highly approachable team whose not only responsive but also very professional!

    Mike Howell

    Digital Software Labs cooperation with us was smooth from the beginning to the end. Highly recommended extremely satisfied with DSL’s provision of services. They’ve been nothing but extremely cooperative and responsible during the entire tenure. Will surely work with them in the future

    Tim Woodhouse

    Digital Software Lab’s business strategy execution is one of the best I’ve experienced so far! The team, the services, and the cooperation- everything was highly professional

    Kyle N.

    Digital Software Labs has been accommodating me for the past entire year. Working with them has shown significant results and their team is highly professional and responsive.

    Edwin Clerk

    Digital Software Labs had us impressed in the first few months. We are especially pleased with the way in which they have tailored their services to fit our environment. Since retaining DSL’s services, the satisfaction rating of the IT department has been at its highest level.

    Pietro Anderson

    Praises for Digital Software Labs for their exceptional work. They’ve been highly responsive of our needs and have elevated our network to a higher level of performance.

    Melinda George

    I’ve always been very satisfied with the standard of integrity, commitment, and customer service provided by Digital Software Labs. They know what they’re doing and it shows

    Peter Lin

    Digital Software Labs are a bunch of incredibly talented and passionate professionals who have done a tremendous job in helping us establish a digital presence in the local market. Responsive, flexible, and forward thinking, they have never once fail to deliver our requests and expectations. It has indeed been a pleasure working with them over our past 3 years in operation.

    John Carmen

    Try a lot of agencies some of the big name even with 10 yrs. of experience and none is comparable to Digital Software Labs. The team is very detailed and knowledgeable, they have manage to reduce my cost per click from fb and google by 100% compare to my old agency. Been in this industry for 6 years and started using agency from day 1, the big agency don’t bother with smaller companies like us unlike they will put in 101% effort for even small companies like us, very happy to have found them through a friend referral.

    Mervin Sim

    Very professional and dedicated team. Lifting lots of burden off our shoulders. Would strongly recommend to others.

    Le Duy Khanh

    I’ve had the pleasure of working with Digital Software Labs for approximately four years now. They are knowledgeable, creative, proactive and responsive, and have proven to be indispensable partners over the years. I view Digital Software Labs as an extension of my own marketing team and a true business partner. Our relationship has grown over the past four years to include marketing efforts beyond digital. Digital Software Labs has produced award-winning videos for our brand. Their team truly exceeds our expectations time and again, and has succeeded in increasing our brand awareness and helped to generate new business for our sales teams. They consistently add value to our organization’s marketing efforts and help us all succeed.

    Lucy Chng

    James and Samantha from the Digital Software Labs team were outstanding. They created our Website for our company and they are amazing. James and Samantha were well prepared throughout the whole process, kept constant communication to assure they had every detail correct and provided a high-quality product within a timely manner. I would recommend their services to anyone looking to create effective and impressive content.

    Hayden Grover

    The app sparked interest in the market and attracted initial users, while receiving no complaints about its functionality or usability. Digital Software Labs excelled at addressing user experience concerns, communicating clearly, and investing in the project’s potential.

    John Archer

    What can I say. an agency with a difference. There is nothing they don’t know about websites and marketing and a joy to work with. I know nothing about the tech side of things and everything is explained in plain English and I am always up to speed with the state of play with all my campaigns which means I can concentrate on the other parts of the businesses. The social media channels are performing like never before and the re-marketing campaigns are now indispensable and account for 25% of our sales. It’s hard to imagine my business without Samantha and his team on board.

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
    [vc_column_text css_animation=”top-to-bottom”]

    PRICING TABLES

    [/vc_column_text]

    Basic
    $199
    One Time
    Buy Now
    Standard
    $299
    One Time
    Buy Now
    Premium
    $399
    One Time
    Buy Now
    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1666367761801{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column disable_custom_paddings_tablet=”true” disable_custom_paddings_mobile=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1606932328414{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

    Our Technologies

    [/vc_column_text][vc_images_carousel images=”24994,24995,24996,24997,24998,24999,25000,25001,25002,25003,25004,25005,25006,25606,25607,25608,25609,25610″ img_size=”1300×1300″ onclick=”link_no” speed=”1500″ slides_per_view=”5″ autoplay=”yes” hide_pagination_control=”yes” hide_prev_next_buttons=”yes” partial_view=”yes” wrap=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1666367656741{background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row]
